name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (SAG2015)
description:
Tic Tac Toe - the classic game with cool graphic and sound.

Tic Tac Toe is a simple game for two players, X and O, who take turns marking the spaces in a 3×3 grid.

The player who succeeds in placing three respective marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game.

Tic Tac Toe game offers 4 difficulty game levels and game for 2 players!

Tic Tac Toe is a great way to pass the time, whether you're standing in line or spending time with the kids. Because of the simplicity of Tic Tac Toe, it is often used as a pedagogical tool for teaching the concepts of good sportsmanship.

Get free Tic Tac Toe now and let the fun begin!
